author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a case of religious mortification gone wrong, three persons were arrested after a 19-year-old boy died of an accidental stab from a trident, in a local temple festival in Kaveripattinam.

The incident occurred on Tuesday, during the local “alagu” festivities, where the devotees pierce their bodies with tridents owing to devotion. Chandru was part of the temple procession, watching the devotees, when the trident of one of them stabbed him in the chest. Chandru succumbed to injuries later.

Following this, the police arrested Nandakumar, who was bearing the trident, along with two others.
title: Three arrested
